str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
Wine. A primary word (yayin); 'wine'.
First, in the first place, before, formerly. Neuter of protos as adverb; firstly.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Less, smaller; poorer, inferior. Or elatton el-at-tone'; comparative of the same as elachistos; smaller.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To be intoxicated with wine, be drunk. From another form of methe; to drink to intoxication, i.e. Get drunk.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
Wine. A primary word (yayin); 'wine'.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.
